title: Quiz 5: Trends & Comprehensive Review
topicName: Unit One: Professionalism and Trends in Nursing
description: A comprehensive review covering modern trends like informatics, aging populations, and global health.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes 'Nursing Informatics'?

options.text: Using data and technology to improve patient care
Teaching patients how to use the internet

questions.explanation: Nursing Informatics integrates nursing science with information technology to manage data and improve health outcomes.

questions.question: Which of the following are significant current trends impacting the nursing profession? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: The population is aging, there is a shortage of nurses, and telehealth is rising. Chronic diseases are actually *increasing*.

questions.question: The delivery of health care services and information via electronic information and telecommunication technologies is called ___BLANK___.
questions.explanation: Telehealth allows for remote care delivery, becoming increasingly important in modern nursing.

questions.question: Order the steps of the Evidence-Based Practice (EBP) process:
What is the term for the ability of a nurse to understand and respect values, attitudes, and beliefs across different cultures?
questions.explanation: Cultural competence is vital in modern nursing due to increasing globalization and diversity.

questions.question: Burnout and Compassion Fatigue are significant challenges facing the modern nursing workforce.
questions.explanation: Due to shortages and high acuity, burnout is a major issue in current nursing trends.

questions.question: Which factor is primarily driving the shift from hospital-based care to community-based care?

options.text: Cost containment and chronic disease management
Nurses refuse to work in hospitals

questions.explanation: Treating patients in the community is more cost-effective and better for managing long-term chronic conditions.

questions.question: Review the infographic data. Which conclusions are supported by the text?

richContent.content:
Global Health Stats

Non-communicable diseases (NCDs) like diabetes and heart disease now account for 71% of all deaths globally. Infectious diseases are decreasing but remain a threat in developing nations.

options.text: NCDs are the leading cause of death globally
Lifestyle diseases are a major health trend
Trauma is the leading cause of death

questions.explanation: The text states NCDs account for 71% of deaths. Infectious diseases are decreasing but not eradicated.
